title: Add BullBoost Performance clickable image banner on every authenticated page

requirements.text: Add a persistent clickable BullBoost Performance logo banner on every authenticated page (all routes inside the Layout component at frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx). The banner must display the uploaded BullBoost Performance logo image (saved as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png). Clicking the image navigates to https://bullboostperformance.com/?ref=xprbexxu in a new tab. The banner should be styled consistently with the app's dark automotive theme (dark/asphalt background, styled as a slim clickable strip or card). Place it in a non-intrusive but visible position — either between the TopBar and the main content area, or as a fixed strip above the BottomNav — similar in placement to the existing eBay affiliate banner. The image must be wrapped in an anchor tag with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'.

quotes: Add this link with this picture click able on every page click the image to go to the site https://bullboostperformance.com/?ref=xprbexxu

acceptanceCriteria: The BullBoost Performance logo image is visible on every authenticated page inside the Layout
Clicking/tapping the image opens https://bullboostperformance.com/?ref=xprbexxu in a new browser tab
The banner does not appear on the unauthenticated landing/intro page
The banner is styled with the app's dark automotive theme, consistent with existing banners
The image is rendered from the static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png
The anchor tag includes rel='noopener noreferrer' for security

constraints: Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
The BullBoost banner must use the provided logo image as a static asset, not fetched from an external URL
The link URL must be exactly https://bullboostperformance.com/?ref=xprbexxu with no modification
nonGoals: Replacing or removing the existing eBay aftermarket parts affiliate banner
Adding the banner to unauthenticated routes or the flash intro/landing page

edits: Save the uploaded BullBoost Performance logo on a pure black background, optimized for use as a banner strip (bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png)
